data.title: Hardest Adam's Crimes Trivia Quiz
data.meta_description: Adam Chandler was a favorite love to hate villain amongst AMC fans. See how well you remember some of his most heinous crimes through this quiz. Good luck! All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. In 1986, Adam hired a thug to shoot which person?

Answer: Palmer Cortlandt

Adam and Palmer's legendary feud came to a boiling point in 1986 when Adam hired someone to take aim at his nemesis. Unfortunate for Adam, Palmer survived the hit he put out on him. However, this resulted in Palmer being temporarily paralyzed from the waist down.

2. In 1986, Adam paid Natalie to spy on whom?

Answer: Palmer Cortlandt

Right after Palmer was wheelchair bound due to injuries sustained from a gunshot wound, Natalie was hired to be his nurse. Adam and Natalie interacted at this time and he persuaded her to spy on him. However, this did not do much good for Adam since Palmer and Natalie fell in love and married shortly afterwards.

3. In 1984, Adam faked his own death to test Erica Kane. While Adam was "dead", Erica became romantically linked to which man?

Answer: Mike Roy

Shortly after Adam walked down the aisle with Erica in 1984,he came up with a ruse to see if she proved herself worthy to him. He faked his own demise in order to see if Erica would move on with another man. Sure enough, Erica the temptress found solace in Mike Roy's arms but their romance was short lived when Adam returned from the dead.

4. Adam also did another faking when he faked his kidnapping in 1994. This time, he did such to test whose loyalty?

Answer: Gloria Marsh

Adam and Gloria married in 1993 but trouble would soon brew approximately one year later when Adam plotted another devious scheme. This time, he faked his own kidnapping to test Gloria. Gloria found out about this and humiliated Adam when she dumped him at the altar when they went to renew their vows. It was at this event that the first scripted tornado struck town.

5. In early 1991, Adam stole a lot of money from whom?

Answer: Natalie Marlowe

Adam and Natalie were married midway through 1990 but things hit the skids when Adam started plotting to swindle her out of her fortune. As they underwent their divorce, Adam compelled her to sign papers of which the contents were not fully disclosed to her. As a result, he got his hands on much of her funds.

6. In late 1994, Adam locked whom in an abandoned building?

Answer: Gloria Marsh

Gloria became pregnant with Adam's child shortly after she made it clear she wanted nothing to do with him. One evening, Gloria mentioned to Adam that she had a high risk pregnancy but he disbelieved her. To punish her for this, Adam locked her in an abandoned building, prompting her to go into premature labor with her pregnancy just six months along. Due to this, Adam and Gloria's daughter, Anna Claire, was stillborn and Gloria soon after went crazy over her death. An interesting fact was later revealed about Gloria: she hated dial-up connection.

7. In 2000, who did Adam blackmail into having Paolo seduce Marian in order to try and break up Stuart and Marian?

Answer: Leo Du Pres

Adam felt that Marian was not good enough for his twin brother, Stuart, and he wanted a way to break them up. To do this, he enlisted Leo into his scheme since he realized that Leo had committed a crime. He blackmailed Leo by saying, if he did not get someone (Paolo) to seduce Marian, he would reveal Leo's crime. Leo reluctantly agreed but, despite this scheme, Stuart stood by Marian's side since he knew she would never cheat on him.

It was then revealed that Paolo drugged Marian to get her into his bed.

8. Sometime during late 2000, Adam sabotaged Colmar Tower in hopes of harming whom?

Answer: Tad Martin

Tad and Liza arranged to have a new skyscraper built named Colmar Tower in honor of them. While it was under construction, he sabotaged the plans so Tad would be there as the building fell to the ground. When he realized that Liza was there during the skyscraper's collapse, he went to try and stop it but he wound up severely injured as a result.

9. In 2002, Adam gaslighted whom?

Answer: Liza Colby

In early 2002, Adam realized that Liza had siphoned off some funds from Chandler Enterprises to prepare herself in case Adam filed for divorce, as the couple had many marital problems the previous year. To get back at her, he gaslighted her for several months in order to prepare for not only divorce but to obtain custody of their daughter, Colby. Adam and Liza were divorced in late 2002 but he did not get sole custody of Colby.

10. During October of 2004, Adam blackmailed whom after he made a video where it looked like she threatened to kill JR?

Answer: Babe Carey

In 2004, Adam was disgusted with Babe's duplicity when she did not inform JR earlier in the year that their marriage was invalid since she was still married to Paul Kramer. JR and Adam both made her pay months down the line but with Adam's role resorting to blackmail. Adam crafted a videotape where it looked as if Babe said she was going to kill JR and he used this against her to try and get her to relinquish custody of their child, "Bess".

This was still during the time when "Bess" was believed to be JR and Babe's daughter.

It was eventually revealed she was Bianca's child, Miranda.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
